Important

  • Requires Mac OS X 14.0 (Sonoma) or newer.

New Features

  • WEBP Support: Added support for WEBP image converting.
  • Video to Still Frames: Added the ability to convert videos (MP4, MOV, AVI, etc.) into still frames.
  • GIF Frame Extraction: Converting an animated or multi-frame GIF now produces individual frames.
  • Quality Control: The Quality Slider now supports fine-grained control (1-100) instead of 10% increments.
  • App Icon Interactions: Added a progress indicator to the app icon during batch conversions. You can also now right-click the app icon to access 'Undo' and 'Cancel Processing' buttons.

Fixes & Improvements

  • The 'Introduction' window now opens automatically on the app's first launch to improve the onboarding experience.
  • Changed the default modifier key for 'Force Delete Originals' to the Shift key.
  • Resolved an issue causing the 'Delete Originals' setting and 'Force Delete Originals' modifier to be ignored in the 'Advanced Conversion' window.
  • Fixed a bug where 'Recursive Folder Drop' was incorrectly enabled by default in the 'Advanced Conversion' window.
  • Prevented multiple instances of the Settings Window from being opened simultaneously.
  • Internal architectural refactoring for better performance and stability.
